description: Try our easy to follow Tropical Angel Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tropical Angel Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the topping, beat the yogurt lightly so it is smooth and creamy, then spoon into the centre of the cake. Top with the fruit, then drizzle over the passion fruit seeds. Finish by scattering over the lime zest.
